item.title: About
item.description:
My academic work focuses predominantly on the fields of philosophy of mind and cognitive science. I’m currently working towards a habilitation and developing a research profile that is independent of the other work groups at the university, though I maintain a close collaboration with the Chair of Philosophy & Cognition.

Before taking the position at the Ruhr-Universität Bochum, I was a postdoc on the ERC-funded EXPERIENCE project and a member of the CO3 or Consciousness, Cognition & Computation Group at the CRNC in Brussels.
